name: Chhole Bhature
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight
Pressure cook soaked chickpeas with salt until soft
Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden
Add ginger garlic paste and cook for a minute
Add tomatoes and cook until soft
Add turmeric red chilli powder and chole masala
Add boiled chickpeas and mix well
Simmer for 10 minutes to blend flavours
Add garam masala and turn off heat
Mix flour semolina salt sugar and oil in a bowl
Add yogurt and knead into a soft dough
Rest dough for 1 hour
Heat oil for deep frying
Roll small dough balls into bhature
Fry until puffed and golden
Serve hot with chhole

name: Kaju katli
steps: Blend cashews into fine powder
Heat sugar and water to make a syrup
Add cashew powder and mix continuously
Cook on low flame until mixture thickens
Add ghee and cardamom powder
Transfer mixture onto greased plate
Flatten using a rolling pin
Let it cool slightly
Cut into diamond-shaped pieces

name: Ras Gulla
steps: Boil milk in a deep pan
Add lemon juice to curdle the milk
Strain and wash the chenna under cold water
Knead the chenna until smooth
Divide and roll into small balls
Boil water and sugar to make syrup
Add the chenna balls into boiling syrup
Cover and cook on medium flame
Let rasgullas expand and turn spongy
Cool and add rose water before serving

name: Pizza
steps: Activate yeast in warm water with sugar
Mix flour and salt in a bowl
Add the activated yeast mixture
Add olive oil and knead into soft dough
Cover and let the dough rise for 1 hour
Divide dough into 3 portions
Roll each portion into a pizza base
Spread pizza sauce over each base
Add cheese and toppings
Sprinkle oregano and chili flakes
Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 12–15 minutes

name: Paneer Tikka Pizza
steps: Mix curd with spices to make paneer tikka marinade
Add paneer cubes and mix well
Rest the marinated paneer for 20 minutes
Activate yeast in warm water with sugar
Mix flour and salt in a bowl
Add yeast mixture and olive oil
Knead into soft dough
Let dough rise for 1 hour
Divide dough into 7 portions
Roll each portion into a pizza base
Spread pizza sauce on each base
Add mozzarella cheese
Add marinated paneer, capsicum, and onions
Sprinkle oregano and chili flakes
Bake at 220°C for 12–15 minutes

name: Pizza
steps: Mix warm water, sugar, and yeast to activate
Combine flour and salt in a bowl
Add yeast mixture and olive oil
Knead into smooth dough
Let the dough rise for 1 hour
Divide the dough into 7 portions
Roll each dough ball into a pizza base
Spread pizza sauce evenly
Add mozzarella cheese generously
Top with corn, bell peppers, onions, olives, and jalapenos
Melt butter and mix with chopped garlic
Brush garlic butter on pizza edges
Sprinkle oregano and chili flakes
Bake at 220°C for 12–15 minutes until golden

name: Veggie Delight Pizza
steps: Activate yeast in warm water with sugar
Mix flour and salt in a bowl
Add yeast mixture and olive oil
Knead into soft dough
Let dough rise for 1 hour
Divide dough into 4 portions
Roll each portion into a pizza base
Spread pizza sauce over each base
Add cheese and vegetable toppings
Sprinkle oregano and chili flakes
Bake in a preheated oven at 220°C for 12–15 minutes

name: Jeera rice - Dal Fry
steps: Wash basmati rice thoroughly and soak for 20 minutes
Heat ghee in a pot and add cumin seeds
Drain rice and add to the pot
Sauté rice for 1 minute
Add water and salt then cook until rice is done
Fluff gently and set aside
Wash toor dal and pressure cook with turmeric and water for 4–5 whistles
Heat oil and ghee in a pan
Add mustard seeds cumin seeds dry red chilli and curry leaves
Add chopped onions and sauté until light brown
Add ginger garlic paste and green chillies cook for a minute
Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft
Add red chilli powder and salt
Add boiled dal and mix well
Simmer for 5–7 minutes
Garnish with coriander leaves
Serve hot with jeera rice

name: Jalebi-Fafda
steps: Mix besan turmeric ajwain salt and baking soda
Add oil and water gradually to form a stiff dough
Knead until smooth and rest 10 minutes
Heat oil for frying
Press dough into long fafda strips
Fry fafda until crispy and golden
Mix maida cornflour yogurt baking powder baking soda and water into a smooth batter
Add food colour and rest 10 minutes
Prepare sugar syrup by boiling sugar and water until sticky
Add cardamom powder and lemon juice to syrup
Heat oil and pipe jalebi spirals
Fry jalebi until crisp and golden
Dip jalebi in warm sugar syrup
Remove and drain excess syrup
Serve hot jalebi with crispy fafda
